data.message: It's a decent song. He knows and expresses many times in the song how he is falling out of fame, and loosing popularity. Now he's just making music for himself, I think he might have a few more amazing verses left in him, but I think this will be his last album.

replies.message: Sadly I'm thinking so too. But I'ma give his other songs a chance. Only 7 days left.

Hes not dying.. u shouldn't talk about him like he's ur 95 year old grandpa on his last birthday lol as long as he has a f@$%£+!G mouth.. he can make music I think he just has some figuring out to do with image and true depth and feeling i hope he takes the right steps because he can still be a beacon of God energy just staying true to himself.
Tyron Turner why would you think the whole album is coming out at once? The release date hasn’t even been announced
